name: It's Just Human
description:
A crysis in heaven forces God to put you in charge of your own human for the very first time. Unfortunately for you, keeping a human alive is not that simple...

You get Brian, who is (apparently) one of the more complex humans out there. You just need to make sure Brian doesn't die by controlling pretty much everything he does: eating, drinking and sleeping. You need to make sure his right and left brain's activity is balanced, and you need to get his anxiety in check.

------------------------------------------

This game was made for Ludum Dare 46. 

The theme was "Keeping It Alive", so I just took that literally.
